column1: 說　　明：       1.本表「規模別」係指事業單位之提繳人數，而非單位員工人數。
column9: Note： 1.The term 'Scale' refers to the number of contributors within the business entity, not the number of employees.

column1: 2.其他係自營作業者，因無隸屬事業單位，故只計人數不計單位數。
column9: 2.Others refer to self-employed workers; since they are not affiliated with any business entities, they are calculated by the

column1: 3.依據「中華民國行業標準分類（第10次修訂）」編製。 ˉ
column9: number of persons and not by the number of business units.
3.Data series were classified refer to Standard Industrial Classification System of R.O.C, Rev.10.
